mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (type_id, email, password, level, nickname, avatar, social_type) VALUES (#{type_id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{level}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{social_type})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET type_id=#{type_id}, password=#{password}, nickname=#{nickname}, avatar=#{avatar}, social_type=#{social_type} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
